attributes.action: Government should not fine parents who choose not to send children in Sept 20
attributes.additional_details: Parents cannot wait to send their children back to school, but parents must feel confident their child is safe. Schools are doing a lot to have a safe enivornment but when virus is still very active and there are many indicators to prove it, then Parents must have the right to decide whether they want to send the kids or continue with home schooling. Parents are willing to home school until situation is better, then why fine them. Parents are worried, specially BAME, so fine is not a solution.
attributes.background: Government should not impose fines on parents who choose not to send their children to school in September 2020. Government must win their trust rather than penalize them for not trusting the Government. There are several serious indicators that proves situation is still risky.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300399
